text: José Procópio Mendes, best known as Zezé Procópio (August 12, 1913 in Varginha, Minas Gerais State - February 8, 1980 in Valença, Rio de Janeiro State) is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. Category:1913 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Footballers from Minas Gerais
title: Zezé Procópio
